values: 认识到，了解到；理解，领会；实现，将...变为现实
To realize is to suddenly understand.
After I left my house, I realized that I left the light on.
vt.了解；实现；实行 （=realise）
v. to understand or become aware of 意识到
v. to achieve 实现
